name: Basic Vegetable Broth
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, vegetables
recipeIngredient: 2 large onions, about 2 pounds, cut into quarters
4 large carrots, about 1 1/2 pounds, peeled and coarsely chopped
8 stalks celery, about 1 pound, rinsed and cut into large pieces, including heart and leaves
2 whole heads garlic, cloves separated, skin intact
6 sprigs fresh thyme or 1 tablespoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: Put all of the ingredients in a large pot and cover them with 6 quarts of cold water. Bring to a boil, lower the heat and simmer gently, until it reduces to 2 1/2 quarts, about 2 to 3 hours. Strain through a sieve lined with cheesecloth.
